welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Arenal, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this city known for its stunning beaches and rich cultural history. We invite you to wander and discover all that El Arenal has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

airports.airport_name: Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained at information desks.
